articles.title: Edward C. Stone, 1936-2024 - Caltech
articles.description: Caltech mourns the loss of Edward C. Stone, leader of humanity’s first foray into interstellar space.
articles.content: Stone's work to open the farthest reaches of space to exploration went beyond space missions. From 1983 to 1988, he served as chair of the Division of Physics, Mathematics and Astronomy at Caltech. W… [+7518 chars]
